body:
Hello everyone, I reinstalled my OpenFoam and VM recently and from then the following errors started popping up with every CFD I run. The errors are: Error1 1. Solution exception:Failed to find points file at C:\Users\Neeharika\butterfly\outdoor_airflow\constant\polyMesh Error2 1. Solution exception:Failed to load values:
Failed to find probes folder folder at C:\Users\Neeharika\butterfly\outdoor_airflow\postProcessing\probes [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/M-kC1yhXlFIrTwPqJUdRsv54BBSzwVkuXReFqsQc4WR1g7E9*-JNyB3BUybtNLGxHds*75S-PjCJslbLE4YI3oJiICe7tgcb/ButterflyError2.jpg) [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/M-kC1yhXlFJJDZlh3T*3wHmzljC*e-M6wtOrdnTw0o0XTCDbjM5-2enXGEBRX*YTt5MMdoym-H*cA**cS30L7uRo88bRgWz-/ButterflyError.jpg)
Any suggestions how can I overcome this error Thank you
